data.title: 'The Man on the Moon' Lesson Plan
data.meta_description: This ESL lesson plan is designed around a Christmas advert and the theme of Christmas. Students watch a Christmas advert, predict the end of a story, answer comprehension questions, analyse a Christmas advert, discuss Christmas, talk about ways of showing people they are loved and reflect on the lesson. Language level: Pre-intermediate (A2) – Intermediate […]
data.text:
This ESL lesson plan is designed around a Christmas advert and the theme of Christmas. Students watch a Christmas advert, predict the end of a story, answer comprehension questions, analyse a Christmas advert, discuss Christmas, talk about ways of showing people they are loved and reflect on the lesson.

Language level: Pre-intermediate (A2) – Intermediate (B1)

Learner type: Children, teens and adults

Time: 90 minutes

Activity: Watching a Christmas advert, predicting the end of a story, answering comprehension questions, analysing a Christmas advert, discussing Christmas, talking about ways of showing people they are loved and reflecting on the lesson

Topic: Christmas and showing people they are loved

Language: Vocabulary related to Christmas, and ‘will’ and ‘going to’ for predictions

Watch the ad.

Check out the lesson plan
